Interface ReportStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
DocxReportStrategy, PdfReportStrategy, TextReportStrategy
public interface ReportStrategy
The ReportStrategy interface defines the contract for different strategies of generating game reports. Implementations of this interface are responsible for taking game events and player data and producing a report in a specific format.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    generateReport(List<GameEvent> gameEvents, List<Player> players, String outputPath)
    Generates a game report based on the provided game events and player information.

  • Method Details

    • generateReport

      void generateReport(List<GameEvent> gameEvents, List<Player> players, String outputPath)
      Generates a game report based on the provided game events and player information.
      Parameters:
      gameEvents - A list of GameEvents that occurred during the game.
      players - A list of Players who participated in the game.
      outputPath - The base path for the output file, without a file extension. The strategy implementation should append the appropriate extension.
